author: Michael Dulaney
title: 'Those people are real heroes': the story of the health workers who contained Ebola
description: An oral history by doctors, nurses and researchers who worked in West Africa to contain "the most deadly communicable disease known to man."
content:
Posted 
April 06, 2020 06:00:00
The Ebola epidemic of West Africa in 2014 was unprecedented in both scale and duration. This is an oral history of the virus as told by researchers and those who worked on the ground to contain its spread over two years.
